name: The War Demo
description:
This is a game I've been working on for the past month. It's based off of a movie my cousins and I made about 15 years ago. Everything other than the background was made from scratch. The demo showcases only one level but I plan on adding more enemies, more levels, and a story to follow along the way! If you have any feed back let me know with this link. Feedback.

Controls MovementWASD / Arrow KeysJump Spacebar / X / W / UpAttackJ / Z / Left ClickEat Dumplings
O / CLock char. directionLeft Ctrl (Toggle)PauseEsc / PBeginner ModeR to Manually Save, limited to 5 Saves Best Speed Run Times

Speed Run Rules

(https://livesplit.org/) (No Beginner Mode)

Start Timer - At the Main Menu

End Timer - Once you beat the boss and get back to the main menu

Any% - Finish the game any way you can

5 Dumpling - Collect all 5 dumplings and use none of them

No Damage - Cannot get hurt or die the entire run

Send Videos of runs to - theradamngo@gmail.com
